relation: Hearings by Indian Affairs and Other Senate Committees (Includes Statements and Testimony by Catholic Church Officials), continued

S. Hearing 98-689, S. 2061 To Declare Certain Lands Held by the Seneca Nation of Indians to be Part of the Allegheny Reservation ... and S. 2177 To Provide ...Lake Superior and Mississippi Bands of Chippewa Judgment Funds ..., CIS 84 S961-12
S. Hearing 98-798, H.R. 3376 A Bill ... Holds Certain Lands in Trust for the Makah Tribe ... and S. 1979 A Bill ... Confirm the Boundaries of the Southern Ute Indian Reservation ..., CIS 84 S961-18

S. Hearing 98-811, S. 1871 ... Restricted Indian Lands to be Leased for Ninety-nine Years and S. 1967 to Compensate the Gros Ventre and Assiniboine Tribes of ... Fort Belknap ... for Irrigation Construction Expenditures, CIS 84 S961-16
S. Hearing 98-819, S. 2184 Amend the Native American Programs Act of 1974, CIS 84 S961-17
S. Hearing 98-926, S. 2614 To Amend the Indian Financing Act of 1974 and S. 2619 To Extend Programs Under the Indian Education Act ... FY 1985, CIS 84 S961-19

S. Hearing 98-1041, S. 2480 ... Mineral Rights ... Held in Trust for the Three Affiliated Tribes of the Fort Berthold Reservation ... and S. 2663 ... Inheritance of Trust or Restricted Land on the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation ..., CIS 85 S411-4
S. Hearing 98-1054, H.J. Res. 158 To Amend the Indian Land Consolidation Act of 1983, CIS 85 S411-5
S. Hearing 98-1282 S. 3092 Jurisdiction on Indian Reservations, CIS 85 S411-10

textAfterTable: BCIM Series 16-2-3 Series Box Folder Folder Title 16-2-3 - - Bills of the Senate of the United States (Record Copy), continued 16-2-3 - - 61st Congress: 1909, 2nd Session 16-2-3 1 1 S. 3196 [Lands to Whitman College in Washington State]: A BILL Granting to the board of trustees of Whitman College the lands embraced in the Fort Walla Walla Military Reservation for the purpose of aiding in the establishment and maintenance of an institution of higher learning in the Pacific Northwest. 16-2-3 1 1 S. 3373 [Crow Reservation Allotment in Montana]: A BILL For the survey and allotment of lands now embraced within the limits of the Crow Indian Reservation in the State of Montana, and the sale and disposal of all surplus lands after allotment. 16-2-3 1 1 S. 7563 [Rio Grande Bridges at Isleta and San Felipe New Mexico]: A BILL For the construction of bridges across the Rio Grande at Isleta Pueblo and San Felipe Pueblo, New Mexico. 16-2-3 1 1 62nd Congress: 1911, 1st Session:
